snippet: With tens of thousands attending the festival, in the eastern state of Bihar, federal officials questioned whether the local government had taken adequate safety steps.
abstract: Officials in India report at least 30 people killed and 25 injured in a stampede during celebration of Hindu festival Dashahara in eastern state of Bihar.
lead_paragraph: With tens of thousands attending the festival, in the eastern state of Bihar, federal officials questioned whether the local government had taken adequate safety steps.

headline.main: At Least 30 Killed in Stampede at Religious Festival in India
